!Guard Pinaps: We've learned Sel Mahums have begun training for battle. Their training grounds are near the Sel Mahum Training Grounds. This is no coincidence. The Town of Oren's safety is at stake. I won't just wait and see. I've sworn an oath to defend. [Quest _251_NoSecrets pinaps_q251_02.htm|Ask about the Sel Mahum Training Grounds.]
